Room.Name: Riverdell Shrubbery
Room.ShortDescription: You feel funny as you crawl under one of the dense shrubberies.
Room.LongDescription: Nevertheless, you have found another training location. Your tracking skills have improved and you are ready to advance to the next level. If your goal is to train, enter the hole in the ground. If you wish to leave the park, go out. If you wish to continue in the park, you must track out of this room.
